name: Misty
description:
My final project, Misty...

The story briefly; In the near future, as our character continues to work in the hangar in space, everything suddenly breaks down. He gets into the space jet before he knows the reason, but there are problems with the jet. Jet falls to the planet. Our character almost dies. Our character must advance in this unknown place or he will die. He sees a secret door and falls into it. So he meets the legend. At least our character thinks so. Because the Legend has planned everything and together the adventure begins to save the universe.

İn 16 and 23. scenes there is problem. Coming soon it will take update
